title: Ring

properties.name: description
properties.value: A ring is an equipment item in RuneScape worn in the ring slot of the equipped inventory menu.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ring
For all items and their stats worn in this slot, see this table

A ring is an equipment item in RuneScape worn in the ring slot of the equipped inventory menu.

Contents

  • 1 Crafting rings
  • 2 Quest rings
  • 3 Other rings
  • 4 Imbued rings
  • 5 Transformation rings
  • 6 See also

Crafting rings[edit | edit source]

These rings can be created with a ring mould, a gold bar and gems (optional) using the Crafting skill with the required Crafting level.

Rings are only decorative in free-to-play, but in pay-to-play they may be enchanted to gain special bonuses. Enchanting a ring (must contain a gem) requires the runes and Magic level necessary to cast the appropriate enchantment spell.

Gem Unenchanted ring Enchanted ring
N/A Gold ring 5 N/A
Opal Opal ring 1 Ring of pursuit 7
Sapphire Sapphire ring 20 Ring of recoil
Jade Jade ring 13 Ring of returning 27
Emerald Emerald ring 27 Ring of dueling
Red topaz Topaz ring 16 Efaritay's aid 49
Ruby Ruby ring 34 Ring of forging
Diamond Diamond ring 43 Ring of life 57
Dragonstone Dragonstone ring 55 Ring of wealth 68
Onyx Onyx ring 67 Ring of stone 87
Enchanted N/A 75 Slayer ring[1] N/A
Eternal N/A 75 Slayer ring (eternal) N/A
Zenyte Zenyte ring 89 Ring of suffering 93
  1. ^ Players can purchase these rings from Slayer Masters, at a cost of 75 points per ring. As well as "purchasing the knowledge" of how to craft the rings, at a one-time cost of 300 points. Since the Slayer gems are already enchanted, unenchanted slayer rings do not exist.

Quest rings[edit | edit source]

ItemAttack BonusesDefence BonusesOther
Beacon ring000200001000%000.0
Lunar ring000200002000%000.0
Ring of charos000000000000%000.0
Ring of visibility000000000000%000.0
'perfect' ring000000000000%000.0

The Ring of charos is used to persuade certain NPCs, allowing discounts. The ring of visibility is used to see the normally invisible e.g. ghosts.

Brimstone ring444644446440%000.0
Celestial ring000000000000%000.0
Elven signet000000000000%000.0
Explorer's ring 4000000000000%010.0

Hallowed ring000000000000%000.0
Ring of endurance000000000000%000.0
Ring of the elements000000000000%000.0

The Hallowed ring negates all direct damage within the Hallowed Sepulchre. The Elven signet provides a 10% chance to not use charges of crystal equipment. The Explorer's ring can be used to teleport to the cabbage patch south of Falador. The Ring of endurance extends the effects of stamina potions and passively reduces run energy drain by 15% when charged with 500 or more doses of stamina potion. The Celestial ring gives an invisible +4 boost to Mining and also gives a chance of obtaining an extra ore up to adamantite.

Imbued rings[edit | edit source]

Some rings may be imbued with an enchantment as a reward from Nightmare Zone. Imbuing them doubles their combat bonuses. All rings, excluding the ring of suffering and Granite ring, cost 650,000 Nightmare Zone points each to upgrade (a holy wrench is also required to upgrade the ring of the gods). The rings that may be imbued are:

Fremennik rings

The imbued ring of wealth offers double chance of clue scroll drops in the Wilderness.

Transformation rings[edit | edit source]

These rings offers no bonuses, but allows players to transform to appear as different objects.
